text: @realDonaldTrump I want to know how anyone justify ANY business being closed or these crazy restrictions for schools as they allow THOUSANDS to gather in the streets & WHO now says covid spread from asymptotic people is VERY RARE?! https://t.co/GTbkI4yjmd
